name: Floral
description: Fragrances dominated by flower scents like rose, jasmine, or lily. Perfect for romantic and feminine vibes.

name: Citrus
description: Bright, zesty scents with notes of lemon, orange, or bergamot. Ideal for daytime freshness.

name: Woody
description: Warm, earthy fragrances with sandalwood, cedar, or patchouli. Great for秋冬 and masculine profiles.

name: Gourmand
description: Sweet, edible-inspired scents like vanilla, caramel, or chocolate. Comforting and playful.

name: Fresh
description: Clean, aquatic, or green notes (e.g., ocean breeze, cucumber). Light and energizing.

name: Oriental
description: Exotic blends with spices, amber, or incense. Sensual and long-lasting.

name: Oud
description: Luxurious Middle Eastern-inspired scents with woody, smoky richness. Unisex and bold.

name: Fruity
description: Juicy notes like berry, peach, or mango. Youthful and vibrant.
